description.p: You gain a +20 bonus to AC while wearing this ring.
Curse. This ring is cursed. Attuning to it curses you until you are targeted by a remove curse spell or similar magic. As long as you remain cursed, you become petrified as a diamond statue.
While wearing this ring, you can turn invisible as an action. Anything you are wearing or carrying is invisible with you.
